text.description:
Come with me to check out Gordon Ramsay's Hells Kitchen in Las Vegas located at the Caesar's Palace. On one best and most hyped up restaurants in Las Vegas known for the Beef Wellington and Sticky Toffee Pudding. First time here and it definitely lived up to the hype for me. The restaurant recently received recognition for being the most photographed restaurant in the United States.
#LasVegas #LasVegasFood #LasVegasStrip
➤ Join this channel to get access to perks✅: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4mm-xK1V2qUo2nZSW4UyKw/join
➤ Tips for Beer 🍺💰 Paypal: https://paypal.me/vegasmusttry
Try one of these playlists: - Best Buffets in Las Vegas 🍕 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZjtmJUHfI07jIBv9YLoxVfwbvHZXVrhk
- Discover New Eats & Restuarants 🍔 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZjtmJUHfI05T5ZMwe42nyOatSBy2Won9
- Tips and News for Vegas 📊 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZjtmJUHfI04Lj93V_eOeVGT5LAT8ZDFC
- Best of Las Vegas Series 🏆 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZjtmJUHfI07HpSkqGJRMHITT68yfb0nf
- Things to Do in Las Vegas 🏂 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZjtmJUHfI041Owa8GCrFGPkVScIcd8uk
- Hotel Review in Vegas 🏬 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZjtmJUHfI04ou_TZcKWxCl35FsLKxhyV
COMMENT any questions below and I'll answer as best as possible! ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ Be part of the VMT community: 🌎 https://facebook.com/vegasmusttry https://instagram.com/vegasmusttry ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━ ━
text.fulltitle: Gordon Ramsay's Hell's Kitchen in Las Vegas - IS the HYPE Real?
text.tags: Las Vegas; Las vegas Strip; Hotels in Las vegas; Food Vlog; las vegas food;
